WorkItem.Description:
The Add Reference dialog in Visual Studio (2010 at least) embeds in a tab an OpenFileDialog/Explorer control.
I'd love to have a C# code sample for this that will work with Windows XP, Vista and 7.
I'd also prefer the "full" Explorer, not the old look as in Visual Studio. But this is optional.
WorkItem.Summary: Host Windows Explorer/OpenFileDialog inside a WPF control?
